page.title: 20DERRYGORE HOUSE
page.content: {Mr John Fawcett}is a major landowner in Fermanagh, with 350 acres of land from the Back Lough at{Cornagrade}to near{Devenish Island.} Derrygore House is situated near the shore at the {Portora Lough Gates.} It was built by the{Irwins}in 1824, accidently burned in 1936,and rebuilt in 1938. Mr Fawcett bought the house in 1964. He employs one full-time worker who also lives on the estate. There are a number of sites of historical interest. On the hill northwest of the Back Lough there are two{standing stones}and on a hill above Devenish there are several{ring {forts.}
